newsitem.title: JAPAN: Foreigners net sellers of Japan stock via 12 firms.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners net sellers of Japan stock via 12 firms.

text.p: Orders placed by foreign investors through 12 foreign securities houses before the start of stock trading on Tuesday showed a net selling stance of 8.9 million shares, market sources said.
Foreign investors' sell orders totalled 24.2 million shares while buy orders amounted to 15.3 million.
